Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: plutil
Description: Check the syntax of property list files, or convert a plist file from one format to another. Specifying - as an input file reads from stdin

Arguments.Name: -help
Arguments.Description: Show the usage information for the command and exit

Arguments.Name: p
Arguments.Description: Print the property list in a human-readable fashion

Arguments.Name: -lint
Arguments.Description: Check the named property list files for syntax errors. This is the default command option if none is specified

Arguments.Name: -convert
Arguments.Description: Convert the named file to the indicated format and write back to the file system

Arguments.Name: xml1
Arguments.Description: For version 1 of the XML plist format

Arguments.Name: binary1
Arguments.Description: For version 1 of the binary plist
Specifies that all further arguments are file names

Arguments.Name: r
Arguments.Description: For JSON, add whitespace and indentation to make the output more human-readable

Arguments.Name: o
Arguments.Description: Specify an alternate path name for the result of the -convert operation; this option is only useful with a single file to be converted. Specifying - as the path outputs to stdout

Arguments.Name: e
Arguments.Description: Specify an alternate extension for converted files, and the output file names are otherwise the same
